title: Power Finance Corporation Ltd gains for fifth session - Business Standard
content: Power Finance Corporation Ltd gains for fifth session  Business Standard
description: Power Finance Corporation Ltd is quoting at Rs 123.95, up 1.68% on the day as on 12:49 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 7.64% in last one year as compared to a 19.38% gain in NIFTY and a 14.08% gain in the Nifty Financial Services.
